outputs.output_descr:
Output 1: Capacity of public and municipal bodies from targeted areas to deliver  good quality services and apply transparent and participatory decision-making at central and local levels built
Output 2: Institutional capacities of key actors improved to further develop and preserve democratic stability, rule of law, new legal framework and accountability of the government. 
Output 3: Assistance to the Government provided to accelerate and sustain a progress towards achievement of MDGs.

project_descr: Gender Mainstreaming and promotion of Women in Decision Making
